proposal: Understanding the essence of decentralized products and services for Web3 is crucial, and it seems SmartContracts Tools is paving the way. With 6 holders in the ETH network, you're setting a solid foundation. Imagine enhancing this journey with tools that allow your community to not just participate but also deploy their own DEX or engage in a blockchain-based lottery. Let's build together, making every token holder not just a part, but a creator in this decentralized landscape.
